artist: Artist: Sue Coe , et al.; Author: Eric Laursen , et al.; Editor: Peter Kuper , et al.; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and illustration of various figures and creatures in a dark, hazy environment, with red tombstones in the lower right corner; 72 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #36: Neo-con
